questionTypes.title: Open ended
questionTypes.description: Respondent can answer with any text

questionTypes.title: Multiple choice
questionTypes.engineTitle: Multiple choice, respondent must choose one answer

questionTypes.title: Multiple choice weighted
questionTypes.engineTitle: Multiple choice weighted 0 to 20, respondent must choose one answer
questionTypes.description: Respondent must choose an answer with weights

questionTypes.title: Integer choice
questionTypes.description: Respondent must enter a whole number

questionTypes.title: Fraction choice
questionTypes.description: Respondent can enter a number with a decimal e.g. currency

questionTypes.title: Year
questionTypes.description: Respondent must answer with a year e.g. 1990

questionTypes.title: NPS choice
questionTypes.description: Respondent must select a number between 0-10

questionTypes.title: NPS comment section
questionTypes.description: Respondent can answer with any text

questionTypes.title: Range choice
questionTypes.description: Respondent must select a number between 0-10

questionTypes.title: End Message
questionTypes.description: The survey terminates at this point

questionTypes.title: Location question
questionTypes.description: Respondent can answer with any text

questionTypes.title: Date Question
questionTypes.description: Respondent will respond with a date(dd.mm.yyyy)

questionTypes.title: Satisfaction range
questionTypes.description: Respondents must select a number within the defined range
